content:
Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 24, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 51, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 43}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft polished_granite_slab, I need to place 3 polished_granite blocks in the top row of the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move one block from slot 40 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 24, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 51, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 43}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed one polished_granite block in the crafting grid. Next I will place the second block to the right of it, in slot 2.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 24, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 51, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 43}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]
thought: I have already placed two polished_granite blocks in the crafting grid. Next I will place the third block to the right of the second block, in slot 3.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 24, "index": 20}, {"type": "gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 51, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 43}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the polished_granite_slabs. Now I will move them from the craft slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
